title: My Best Friend's Triplet Brothers
description: Walking into the wrong room and catching one of my best friend’s triplet brothers in the shower was going to cost me EVERYTHING.Especially since it was her wedding... and I was the maid of honor.I should have turned around.Friends never sleep with their friends’ brothers. It’s code.Instead, Warren gave me pleasure like I’ve never experienced.Then his brothers joined in on the fun.Growing up, the triplets always tormented me.I was the nerdy, awkward girl they teased.They were arrogant jerks that made my life hell.Naturally, I wanted nothing to do with them.But when they touched me, my skin felt like it was on fire.Every word they whispered in my ear was intoxicating.I craved them more than I feared the consequences.Now, it’s only a matter of time until my dark past comes knocking at the door,and all of my dirty little secrets are revealed.The Strickland Brothers may have my heart,but do they love me enough to pick up its broken pieces?Can I save my friendship and her wedding before it’s too late?18+ Only. Standalone contemporary reverse harem romance with a HEA.
author: Rebel Bloom
